languages.text: {n}Вас охватывает нестерпимая лихорадка: лоб усеивает бисер пота, руки начинают дрожать, а дыхание сбивается. В сознании начинает ворочаться нечто чуждое — нечто, явственно обращающее свое двойственное внимание на вас.{/n}

{n}A blinding fever consumes you. Your forehead beads with sweat, your hands tremble, and your breath grows uneven. Something alien comes to life in your mind, and you sense it turning its dualistic attention to you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вас охватывает нестерпимая лихорадка: лоб усеивает бисер пота, руки начинают дрожать, а дыхание сбивается. В сознании начинает ворочаться нечто чуждое — нечто, явственно обращающее свое двойственное внимание на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}An unbearable fever falls upon you: your forehead covers in manyfold drops of sweat, your hands start trembling, and your breath becomes uneven. Something alien comes to life in your mind, something obviously turning its ambivalent attention to you.{/n}

{n}An unbearable fever falls upon you: your forehead covers in manyfold drops of sweat, your hands start trembling, and your breath becomes uneven. Something alien comes to life in your mind, something obviously turning its ambivalent attention to you.{/n}

{n}A blinding fever consumes you. Your forehead beads with sweat, your hands tremble, and your breath grows uneven. Something alien comes to life in your mind, something clearly turning its ambivalent attention to you.{/n}

{n}A blinding fever consumes you. Your forehead beads with sweat, your hands tremble, and your breath grows uneven. Something alien comes to life in your mind, something clearly turning its ambivalent attention to you.{/n}

{n}A blinding fever consumes you. Your forehead beads with sweat, your hands tremble, and your breath grows uneven. Something alien comes to life in your mind, and you sense it turning its dualistic attention to you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}某种刺眼的高温吞噬了你。你额头冒汗，双手颤抖，呼吸越来越不均匀。你的脑海中浮现出了某种异样的东西，你感觉到，那个东西将它二元性的注意力转向了你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blinding fever consumes you. Your forehead beads with sweat, your hands tremble, and your breath grows uneven. Something alien comes to life in your mind, and you sense it turning its dualistic attention to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}某种刺眼的高温吞噬了你。你额头冒汗，双手颤抖，呼吸越来越不均匀。你的脑海中浮现出了某种异样的东西，你感觉到，那个东西将它二元性的注意力转向了你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une fièvre incandescente s'empare de vous. Des gouttes de sueur perlent à votre front, vos mains se mettent à trembler et votre souffle se fait court. Une entité étrangère s'éveille dans votre esprit et dirige son attention ambivalente vers vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blinding fever consumes you. Your forehead beads with sweat, your hands tremble, and your breath grows uneven. Something alien comes to life in your mind, and you sense it turning its dualistic attention to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une fièvre incandescente s'empare de vous. Des gouttes de sueur perlent à votre front, vos mains se mettent à trembler et votre souffle se fait court. Une entité étrangère s'éveille dans votre esprit et dirige son attention ambivalente vers vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}目も眩むような熱が体を蝕む。額には玉の汗が流れ、手は震え、息は荒くなっていく。異質な何かが心の中に芽生え、その二元的な意識があなたに注意を向けているのをはっきりと感じる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blinding fever consumes you. Your forehead beads with sweat, your hands tremble, and your breath grows uneven. Something alien comes to life in your mind, and you sense it turning its dualistic attention to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}目も眩むような熱が体を蝕む。額には玉の汗が流れ、手は震え、息は荒くなっていく。異質な何かが心の中に芽生え、その二元的な意識があなたに注意を向けているのをはっきりと感じる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una fiebre cegadora te invade. Tu frente chorrea de sudor, te tiemblan las manos y tu aliento se vuelve intermitente. Algo extraño cobra vida en tu mente y percibes que dedica su atención por partida doble.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blinding fever consumes you. Your forehead beads with sweat, your hands tremble, and your breath grows uneven. Something alien comes to life in your mind, and you sense it turning its dualistic attention to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una fiebre cegadora te invade. Tu frente chorrea de sudor, te tiemblan las manos y tu aliento se vuelve intermitente. Algo extraño cobra vida en tu mente y percibes que dedica su atención por partida doble.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein blendendes Fieber verzehrt dich. Auf deiner Stirn perlt der Schweiß, deine Hände zittern und dein Atem wird unregelmäßig. Etwas Fremdartiges erwacht in deinem Verstand zum Leben. Etwas, das seine dualistische Aufmerksamkeit auf dich richtet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blinding fever consumes you. Your forehead beads with sweat, your hands tremble, and your breath grows uneven. Something alien comes to life in your mind, and you sense it turning its dualistic attention to you.{/n}

{n}Ein blendendes Fieber verzehrt dich. Auf deiner Stirn perlt der Schweiß, deine Hände zittern und dein Atem wird unregelmäßig. Etwas Fremdartiges erwacht in deinem Verstand zum Leben. Etwas, was seine ambivalente Aufmerksamkeit eindeutig auf dich richtet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ani bir ateşle kavruluyorsun. Alnın, boncuk boncuk terliyor; ellerin titriyor ve nefes alıp verişin düzensizleşiyor. Zihninde yabancı bir şey canlanıyor, değişken dikkatini sana çevirdiğini hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blinding fever consumes you. Your forehead beads with sweat, your hands tremble, and your breath grows uneven. Something alien comes to life in your mind, and you sense it turning its dualistic attention to you.{/n}
